      • parseScheduleFile

        public java.util.List<Group> parseScheduleFile(java.lang.String pathToFile)
        Method in charge of parsing the file that contains the information about the timetable of the school groups.

        If the file is not found or the format is incorrect, an error will be shown and the execution stops.

        Specified by:
        parseScheduleFile in interface Parser
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - path to the file containing the information about the timetable of the school groups.
        Returns:
        list of the school groups with the information about their classes.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        pathToFile - path to the file that contains the information about the student enrollments.
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • parseAssigmentPreferences

        public java.util.Map<Group,java.util.List<Group>> parseAssigmentPreferences(java.lang.String pathToFile,
                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Group> groupMap)
        Method in charge of parsing the assignment preferences file.

        If the file is not found or the format is incorrect, an error will be shown and the execution stops.

        Specified by:
        parseAssigmentPreferences in interface Parser
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - path to the CSV file containing the assignment preferences.
        groupMap - map containing the existing groups.
        Returns:
        a map in which the key represents a group and the value a list of groups that must also be assigned when the key group is assigned.

        parseGeneticAlgorithmParams in interface Parser
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - path to the properties file containing the genetic algorithm parameters.
        Returns:
